title: Why do people come into our lives and leave just like that?

replies.msg:
As fellows know there's rarely a person can be seen as perfect. Most of the time, people are trying to look for a perfect partner or soul mate which sounds like an impossible and unachievable task. Have you ever had a long-term friendship or long-term love affair? How does the relationship end up? How is it going? If the relationship is still fairly constant for a long time. It feels like it will last forever, then congratulation. Maybe you have already found the right one.

Unfortunately, not everyone is that lucky. Most of the people perpetually attempt to find the true person. Whether it's friend or partner. However, most of us don't have much luck. We keep trying and trying, facing a lot of hardship during the entire relationship, experiencing varieties of emotion. Happiness, sadness, anger, uneasiness.At last/In the end, you got dumped, she said she doesn't love you anymore. It all ends up a failure.It's all for nothing.

Is it really worth it to engage in a relationship?People come into our lives and leave just like that.Some said people come into your life for a reason, Some said some people come into our lives and quickly go.What do you think? xD
xDD
Don’t invest to much in a relationship. Relationships end. Knowledge and life experience is your best friend forever.
i don't fucking understand

xDD

Don’t invest to much in a relationship. Relationships end. Knowledge and life experience is your best friend forever.

totally agree
diu no chinese
lol wat,you got google m8

If theres no beginning, theres no ending.
Im used to be with only myself for a long time, because I really dont want to lose anyone else, it hurt so much.
This is not a good and wise choice if you cant bear loneliness that could destroy you
If you never try, you will never know. Possibly you are unclear of what makes a person right to you in a romantic relationship.

replies.msg:
thx for replying, actually I've become a lone wolf since I failed in so many different kinds of relationship.I realize people come into our lives and quickly go.They don't stay for too long.

Eventually, we all gonna die right.In the end, everyone will have to bear with loneliness.;(((

Though the process maybe painful, I still it worths to find your destined one with trial and error. I believe the happiness and comfort you feel when you can be your normal true self without any disguise make all the pains beforehand worth.

I am still finding it though

Have the same feeling recently
just feeling lost and insecure

replies.msg: honestly communicate with your partner your feeling
People who are meant to stay, will stay. You don’t need to fight for a spot. People lies but actions don’t Time will tell.

quote.msg: People who are meant to stay, will stay. You don’t need to fight for a spot. People lies but actions don’t Time will tell.

replies.msg: agree.. If he/she is meant to be in your life, you don't need to make a lot of effort to sustain the relationship.
any ideas? DDDD

Maybe here is the answer

The fox : you see the grain-fields down yonder? I do not eat bread. Wheat is of no use to me. The wheat fields have nothing to say to me. And that is sad. But you have hair that is the color of gold. Think how wonderful that will be when you have tamed me! The grain, which is also golden, will bring me back the thought of you. And I shall love to listen to the wind in the wheat..."

So the little prince tamed the fox. And when the hour of his departure drew near--
"Ah," said the fox, "I shall cry."
"It is your own fault," said the little prince. "I never wished you any sort of harm; but you wanted me to tame you . . ."
"Yes, that is so," said the fox.
"But now you are going to cry!" said the little prince.
"Yes, that is so," said the fox.
"Then it has done you no good at all!"
"It has done me good," said the fox, "because of the color of the wheat fields."
人生苦短 宜及時作樂
